p: Fibre that forms the cell walls of forages and is not dissolved in neutral detergent fiber (NDF), not dissolved in acid detergent fiber (ADF) and contents of lignin not dissolved in acid detergent were determined according to methods stated by Van Soest et al [ 11]. Hemicellulose and cellulose were determined through calculation [ 11]. Enzimatic solubility of organic matter (ESOM) was determined with the procedure reported by Nauman and Bassler [ 12]. In the technique, pre-treatment with pepsin-hydrochloric acid solution, followed treatment by cellulase (Onozuka R 10 from Trichoderma viride, Merck, Darmstadt, Germany) .
